about_the_game:
Step into Camden, Pennsylvania, 1946, as a detective investigating a string of brutal disappearances. Your investigation quickly unearths a chilling reality—anatomically precise murders, demons lurking in the shadows, and the journal of a missing child, Tommy, that reveals a deadly trap. In this twisted survival horror experience, you must flee from or fight against relentless demonic entities using faith, holy artifacts, and The Holy Bible.

In a 2-3 hour psychological horror experience, encounter terrifying chases and intense, music-driven boss fights as you uncover clues to Riker Manor's dark history. Exercise your investigation and puzzle solving skills in order to find an escape. Each choice pushes you closer to one of multiple endings, with disturbing game-over animations if you fail. Packed with hidden lore and haunting Easter eggs, Camden's sinister secrets will stay with you long after you escape—or join the list of the missing.

content_descriptors.notes: There is an option to turn off the extreme gore cutscenes, however there will still be prevalent gore in game with very pixelated graphics. The level of gore in the cutscenes is VERY extreme, (I studied human anatomy to make them acurate). They may be disturbing to younger or even adult audiences.

detailed_description:
Step into Camden, Pennsylvania, 1946, as a detective investigating a string of brutal disappearances. Your investigation quickly unearths a chilling reality—anatomically precise murders, demons lurking in the shadows, and the journal of a missing child, Tommy, that reveals a deadly trap. In this twisted survival horror experience, you must flee from or fight against relentless demonic entities using faith, holy artifacts, and The Holy Bible.

In a 2-3 hour psychological horror experience, encounter terrifying chases and intense, music-driven boss fights as you uncover clues to Riker Manor's dark history. Exercise your investigation and puzzle solving skills in order to find an escape. Each choice pushes you closer to one of multiple endings, with disturbing game-over animations if you fail. Packed with hidden lore and haunting Easter eggs, Camden's sinister secrets will stay with you long after you escape—or join the list of the missing.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 14.3.1
  • Processor: 3 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 570X 4 GB
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: built-in hardware digital-to-analog converter (DAC) that supports sample rates up to 96 kHz
  • Additional Notes: This is not the absolute minimum, It is just my system.

name: Tommy's Journal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 14.3.1
  • Processor: 3 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 570X 4 GB
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: built-in hardware digital-to-analog converter (DAC) that supports sample rates up to 96 kHz
  • VR Support: Does not support VR devices.
  • Additional Notes: This is not the absolute minimum, It is just my system.

short_description: A psychological horror mystery in a pixel art style, set in a 1940's mansion infested with demons and magic. The magic can be wielded in the form of books, but there comes a dark cost. Exercise demons or join them to escape the haunted manor with your life.
